title: What should one write about as his first blog post? - Quora

response.answer_text: I believe, your first post and every posts should have the same value. In first post there is no magic you have to do,but you have to decide on what niche you are going to write and also rethink about the future of your blog. As a newbie, every blogger make mistakes but you can edit and make it more valuable to your audience. You make your audience satisfy on your blog post and also is your blog posts giving best answers for what your audience seeking for.

First figure out on what niche you want write your blog, and after that you can start writing your first blog. Let's suppose if you want to start blog on “blogging tutorial” niche, then you can write your first blog post on any of the following topic, What is blog and how you can make it.How to start a blog.Etc.Its totally depends on you what topic you choose and what you want to write.
